channel.title: [Bug:Typographical] Typo in Priest Night Ability "Revive"
channel.description:
#### Player went to review the skills for Priest for typographical errors
#### Player should noticed limited to no typographically errors
#### Steps to reproduce:
1, Player is randomly allocated the Priest role with alignment to the Blue Dragon 2. Player reviews their assigned passives and abilities
#### Comments: The current text on the Night Ability Revive is "Give up your own loife to bring a dead Blue Dragon player back to lfie. Text for 'life' is spelled incorrectly.
Screenshot for reference: https://imgur.com/a/9QFKX

item.title: [Bug:Typographical] Typo in Priest Night Ability "Revive"
item.dc:creator: Methnor
item.description:
Blatant joke thievery right there

Read full topic

item.title: [Bug:Typographical] Typo in Priest Night Ability "Revive"
item.dc:creator: Pandatron76
item.description:
Player went to review the skills for Priest for typographical errors

Player should noticed limited to no typographically errors

Steps to reproduce:

1, Player is randomly allocated the Priest role with alignment to the Blue Dragon
2. Player reviews their assigned passives and abilities

Comments:

The current text on the Night Ability Revive is "Give up your own loife to bring a dead Blue Dragon player back to lfie.
Text for ‘life’ is spelled incorrectly.

Screenshot for reference: https://imgur.com/a/9QFKX

Read full topic
